p: The targets for 2000 were met in 2005 due to improvements in living conditions and DOTS in China, India, and Indonesia, the countries with the highest burden of disease then and now [ 14], but many countries did not meet them. The Global Plan to Stop TB, 2006â€“2015 set bold new targets to halve the prevalence and death rates of TB by 2015 (as compared with the estimated prevalence in 1990).
